name: Gulp! (PC Version)
description:
Gregory, a vulnerable jelly squid, and Sir Klyde, a blind swordfish, must work together to escape the stomachs of Jermaine, a giant whale! The pair must find their way through enemies and puzzles to make it out of the whale alive.

UPDATES:

  • Speedrun Timer and speedrun capbilities
  • Pause Button Menu
  • Glitches/Bugs
    • UI background too small for certain resolutions
    • Beating the game after death
  • General user friendliness

Web Version: https://allthefame37.itch.io/gulp-web
